creator: mhilpert@gmx.de
text:
It would be usefull to have a static method that returns version information of 
the used batik library, just like apache Xalan or Xerces APIs:

org.apache.batik.Version.getVersion()

:-)

creator: vincent.hardy@sun.com
text:
There is now an org.apache.batik.Version.getVersion() as suggested by the bug
report. This is used in the Squiggle browser's About box.
